channel.title: ZezumaScape is under attack, need help with a code
channel.description: My PServer ZezumaScape which everyone knows is under attack now. I need to know how to limit the max amount of players on the server. I changed it in server.java and compiled but it doesnt work. Somebody please help.

item.title: ZezumaScape is under attack, need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

The server status list does the null so they can check if its online or not.

item.title: ZezumaScape is under attack, need help with a code
item.dc:creator: @whitenite whitenite
item.description:
@whitenite wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:1, topic:35014”]My PServer ZezumaScape which everyone knows is under attack now. I need to know how to limit the max amount of players on the server. I changed it in server.java and compiled but it doesnt work. Somebody please help.[/quote] probably “someone” is nulling your server.
To change “maxplayers” open PlayerHandler.java.and you should see something like that “public static final int maxPlayers = 40” Change the number after “=” .
If you don’t see it,then search :

public static final int maxPlayers

this may not help you,but try find out who’s doing this (or who are doing this).

Read full topic
